column4: News;Battambang:------ Police said that 37 students of Sampov Loun High School had fainted on the 4th of December
column6: and were sent to Referral Hospital in SSampov Loun District
column7: Battambang Province. The number of fainting students totaled 37; 2 boys and 35 females. ------The authorities still do not know why exactly
column8: but some suspect that food sold in school maybe to blame. Some of the students were allowed to go home.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/392566
